metadata.Title: CVE-2020-20813 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Control Channel in OpenVPN 2.4.7 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted reset packet.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> There are no details about this issue as of 2023-11-13

criterions.comment: openvpn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
